Articles.Content:
i have been mucking around with the free for a while but decided to buy the game on my birthday well a week after

when the .20 was released

Hi!

I'm Alex one of the worst ****ing KSP players to crash into the sun!

Add me on skype if ya wanna play together! Pasta549 (Mr.kitty)

Cheers!

-Alex

Welcome to the forums!

Since you're a relatively new player, I'd highly recommend that you have a look at some of the tutorials and other player guides listed in the Drawing Board (link in my sig). Many of them have been written specifically with people who are new to KSP in mind. You can also ask questions in the How To forums if you ever get stuck anywhere, or if you just want to learn more about how the whole "rocket science" thing works.

Happy landings!
